inputs.topic_category_motivation: Specific bond yield, a financial asset.
inputs.motivation_for_relevance: UK 30‑year gilt yield does not map to any canonical market handle (e.g., UST, Bund, BTP) and lacks a dated catalyst window tied to a causal transmission path; therefore it fails the acceptance gate.

llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: UK 30‑year gilt yields spiking to 5.7% signals rising fiscal risk and sterling weakness, creating a new macro driver.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: UK 30-Year Gilt Yield
